# conveyor_team (Resource)

Provides a Conveyor team.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "conveyor_team" "dev" {
  name = "dev"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the team.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The id of the team.
